H0.text: What is the capital of Algeria. Algiers

H1.text: What is the capital of Algeria. Oran

H2.text: What is the capital of Algeria. Constantine

H3.text: What is the capital of Algeria. Dzair

A4.text: Algiers is the capital city of Algeria, located on the Mediterranean Sea in the north-central portion of the country.

A5.text: It has remained the capital of the modern Algerian state since the Algerian Revolution in 1962.
